hero.title: Regenerativa
hero.subtitle: A global initiative for integral regeneration
hero.description: Join the movement to build sustainable, resilient communities through bioregional networks and regenerative practices.

footer.description: A global initiative for integral regeneration. Join the movement to build sustainable, resilient communities.

hero.title: Regenerative Village
hero.subtitle: A Third Sector village between nature, innovation and community.
hero.description: Discover our vision and join the community

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: "Not just a settlement, but an ecosystem of life and social innovation. The Third Sector village combines sustainable living, coworking and active community: a pioneering model inspired by the Bottega del Terzo Settore, but expanded to include residential, hospitality and collective spaces."

location.title: Location & History
location.description: "Nestled in the heart of the Marche region, our village offers the perfect blend of natural beauty and strategic accessibility. Located just 10 minutes from the historic center of Ascoli Piceno, the cultural capital of the region, it provides residents with both tranquility and urban convenience."
location.sizeDesc: Approximately 50 hectares of land dedicated to sustainable development, housing, community spaces, and agricultural areas
location.historyDesc: Built on ancient agricultural traditions with a vision for the future, combining historical wisdom with modern regenerative practices
location.ascoliPicenoDesc: 10 minutes from the historic center - cultural capital of the Marche region with Renaissance architecture and local traditions
location.adriaticCoastDesc: 30 minutes drive to beautiful beaches and coastal towns along the Adriatic Sea
location.skiAreaDesc: 30 minutes to nearby ski areas in the Sibillini Mountains, offering winter sports and mountain activities
location.romeDesc: 2.5 hours by car to the center of Rome, connecting you to Italy's cultural and business hub
location.sibilliniParkDesc: 15 minutes to the entrance of Sibillini National Park, offering hiking trails, wildlife viewing, and mountain activities
location.lagaParkDesc: 45 minutes to Laga Mountains National Park, featuring ancient forests, waterfalls, and biodiversity-rich landscapes
location.accessibilityDesc: Easily accessible via major highways, with convenient connections to regional and national transportation networks

communityCulture.title: Community and Culture
communityCulture.description: "The village also becomes a cultural stage: concerts, conferences, outdoor cinema. Nature becomes the scenery, and the community the protagonist. Every event becomes an opportunity to give birth to new ideas, collaborations, social impact projects."

innovationCoworking.title: Innovation and Coworking
innovationCoworking.description: "A social innovation hub immersed in greenery. Shared workspaces, workshop rooms, places to incubate Third Sector startups and projects. Here living and working coincide, creating a continuous flow between life and innovation."
innovationCoworking.workspacesDesc: Shared coworking areas immersed in nature, designed to foster creativity and collaboration
innovationCoworking.workshopRoomsDesc: Dedicated spaces for workshops, training and community meetings
innovationCoworking.startupIncubatorDesc: Support for Third Sector startups and social impact projects

dailyLifeGastronomy.title: Daily Life and Gastronomy
dailyLifeGastronomy.description: "A community restaurant with km 0 cuisine. Shared gardens that become education classrooms and sustainability laboratories. Every meal tells the story of the territory and the relationships that sustain it."
dailyLifeGastronomy.communityRestaurantDesc: Km 0 cuisine with local and sustainable products
dailyLifeGastronomy.sharedGardensDesc: Educational spaces to learn about sustainability
dailyLifeGastronomy.authenticRelationshipsDesc: Every meal celebrates the territory and human connections

wellnessNature.title: Wellness and Nature
wellnessNature.description: "Wellness is an integral part of the experience: relaxation spaces, unspoiled nature, authentic connection with oneself and with others. Regenerative Village is a village where time slows down, and life resumes its natural rhythm."
wellnessNature.relaxationSpacesDesc: Areas dedicated to rest and contemplation
wellnessNature.unspoiledNatureDesc: Deep connection with the natural environment
wellnessNature.authenticConnectionDesc: Natural rhythm of life and genuine relationships

futureInnovation.title: Future and Innovation
futureInnovation.description: "A living laboratory for the future of the Third Sector. A village that inspires new forms of solidarity economy, participatory governance and environmental sustainability. Regenerative Village is not just a place to live: it's a place to build the future together."
futureInnovation.solidarityEconomyDesc: New economic models based on solidarity and sustainability
futureInnovation.participatoryGovernanceDesc: Collective decisions and active community participation
futureInnovation.environmentalSustainabilityDesc: Ecological practices integrated into daily life
futureInnovation.buildFuture: Regenerative Village is not just a place to live: it's a place to build the future together.

villageVisions.title: Village Visions
villageVisions.description: Discover the concepts and visions of our village through these images made on the actual location.

callToAction.title: Join the Future of the Third Sector
callToAction.description: Regenerative Village is more than a village: it's a movement to build together a sustainable, inclusive and innovative future. Your participation can make the difference.
